transcript: What wait, I didn't go to a website. Why do I need it's the DMV you come to the DMV you're waiting in line for three hours and then you go home.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: What web- I didn't go to a website - why would I need to - it's the D.M.V.. You come to the D.M.V., you wait in line for three hours, and then you go home.
